Description:
When I do any of the following, operation is performed and completed but the UI does not reflect it.
||Action||Result||UI View||Current Fix||Result of Fix||
|Change Branch|New branch is selected|UI still shows old branch as selected, in bold.|Press F5 to Refresh UI|UI shows new branch selected in bold|
|Click on Stage All or Stage Selected|Files are moved to Staged Files area|UI still shows empty Staged Files area|Press F5 to Refresh UI|Staged files area shows selected files|
|Click on Pull Button|Branch is updated|UI does not show that pull was completed. Still shows bubble with number.|Press F5 to Refresh UI|UI shows pull was completed and bubble showing number goes away|

These are just a few examples. I am using Windows 10 Pro version 1909. Sourcetree shows version 3.3.6 in Help -> About Sourcetree.
Creator: Abdullah Rizwan

Comments.Author: Mark
Comments.Comment:
I am having the same issue. Staging, commiting, changing branches, etc. all occur, but the UI does not reflect the action. I am on Windows 10 Enterprise 10.0.17134, Sourcetree version 3.3.6. 

Update: SRCTREEWIN-12705 suggests several possible workarounds, one of which (rearranging the tabs) works for me.
